summary: We can also visualize class inheritance and interface implementations: [![alt text][2]](http://benmcevoy.co.nz/blog/get/media_inherit_isom.png) *MainView is a WPF window by the look of it, and inherits a lot of stuff because of it.* Or assembly references: ![alt text][3] *The MediaGrabber assembly references the usual system assemblies, as well as Castle and the RSS and Download manager components.* And if I ever get around to it, you could also visualize namespace references as well...
keywords: assembly, }, {, constructor, downloads, look, references, graph, rss
title: Visualizing Dependancies
